name: billing-taxation
description: Use when identifying tax, billing, and revenue recognition obligations for software products sold globally. Covers service type classification and billing codes, VAT/GST/sales tax, invoicing requirements, revenue recognition (ASC 606/IFRS 15), cloud credits and stored-value models, and money transmission risks for prepaid systems.
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick

references.title: IFRS 15 Revenue from Contracts with Customers
